title: Rental First, Then Main Residence

properties.notes: sold - Investment property converted to main residence. Partial exemption for main residence period only.

user_query: I bought an investment property, rented it for 3 years, then moved in for 5 years before selling. What CGT do I owe?

scenario_info.name: Rental First, Then Main Residence (First Use to Produce Income)
scenario_info.description: Emma purchases an investment property and rents it immediately. After 3 years, she moves in. Six-year rule does NOT apply - only main residence period is exempt.
